title: Home in Fort Ward area
posting_body: This beautiful tree-lined single family house is located near the Lynwood Center area of the Island as well as walking distance to Fort Ward park.
This home comes with an open floor plan on main level flowing from living room to dining room to kitchen.
Kitchen is bright with sleek granite countertops, propane range, walk-in pantry, beautiful private deck off dining room.
Also included is an office on main floor, propane fireplace in living room, den/family room on upper level, hardwood floors, 2 car garage with plenty of driveway parking and much more.
Pets negotiable with owner approval and additional deposit
Visit our website for more info
